headline.main: Ideas Help No One on a Shelf. Take Them to the World.

docs.abstract: Distributing, promoting and lending continuing support to good ideas for fixing the world’s woes is as critical a task as thinking them up in the first place.
docs.snippet: Distributing, promoting and lending continuing support to good ideas for fixing the world’s woes is as critical a task as thinking them up in the first place.

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal health regulators plan to warn consumers more strongly about Essure, a contraceptive implant that has drawn thousands of complaints from women reporting chronic pain, bleeding and other health problems.

headline.main: New, Stronger FDA Warning for Essure Birth Control Implant
headline.print_headline: New, Stronger FDA Warning for Essure Birth Control Implant

docs.snippet: Federal health regulators plan to warn consumers more strongly about Essure, a contraceptive implant that has drawn thousands of complaints from women reporting chronic pain, bleeding and other health problems.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Tennessee woman accused of trying to end her pregnancy with a coat hanger will not face attempted murder charges, her attorney said Monday.

headline.main: Woman Who Tried to Self-Abort Won't Face Attempted Murder
headline.print_headline: Woman Who Tried to Self-Abort Won't Face Attempted Murder

docs.snippet: A Tennessee woman accused of trying to end her pregnancy with a coat hanger will not face attempted murder charges, her attorney said Monday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman pleaded guilty Monday to setting her newborn on fire and leaving her in the middle of a New Jersey street.

headline.main: Woman Pleads Guilty to Setting Her Newborn on Fire in Road
headline.print_headline: Woman Pleads Guilty to Setting Her Newborn on Fire in Road

docs.snippet: A woman pleaded guilty Monday to setting her newborn on fire and leaving her in the middle of a New Jersey street.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court challenge to a Texas law that has dramatically reduced the number of abortion clinics in the state is the justices' most significant case on the hot-button issue in nearly a quarter-century.

headline.main: Abortion Case Returns to Supreme Court After Loss of Scalia
headline.print_headline: Abortion Case Returns to Supreme Court After Loss of Scalia

docs.snippet: The Supreme Court challenge to a Texas law that has dramatically reduced the number of abortion clinics in the state is the justices' most significant case on the hot-button issue in nearly a quarter-century.

docs.lead_paragraph: With five months to go until the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, the challenges keep piling up.

headline.main: Rio's Challenges, Doping in Russia and Kenya Top IOC Agenda
headline.print_headline: Rio's Challenges, Doping in Russia and Kenya Top IOC Agenda

docs.snippet: With five months to go until the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, the challenges keep piling up.

docs.lead_paragraph: The discovery of a toxic chemical in the Hoosick Falls, N.Y., water supply has alarmed residents, some of whom are critical of officials’ response.

headline.main: Fears About Water Supply Grip Village That Made Teflon Products
headline.print_headline: Link to Teflon Tainted Water, a Village Fears

docs.abstract: Village of Hoosick Falls, NY, is roiled by revelation public water supply contains high levels of toxic chemical perfluorooctanoic acid, or PFOA, linked to number of health issues including cancer and thyroid disease; response from New York State public health officials has been criticized, and federal class-action lawsuit has been filed against Saint-Gobain Performance Plastics and Honeywell International, current and former owners of plant that state claims to be source of toxic chemical.
docs.snippet: The discovery of a toxic chemical in the Hoosick Falls, N.Y., water supply has alarmed residents, some of whom are critical of officials’ response.
